documents.document: Goddamn you Bryan Adams! I think you've broken my heart!! 💔(please see previous tweets else this makes no fucking sense)
...years? I don't think I've felt this disappointed in someone in ages....well at least since Trump was elected
I just read on BuzzFeed that Summer of 69 is about the sex position not the year. How could I have not known this? Singing along all these..
That made me actually LOL for reals 😝 https://t.co/VSqglk4nJX
@queen_ursula_uk ha! It's what I excel at after all!
@queen_ursula_uk it's all adverts & people retweeting the same goddamn shit. Maybe it's just me being grumpy 😝
@shannonwoodward they'll be comfortable in their prison uniforms
I feel like Twitter is turning into Facebook 😞
I could really not care less that Beyoncé is pregnant (but I did have to make sure I got the accent right on that é… https://t.co/25tB5L2NjE
I'm not sure why but I put Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles on my Lovefilm list and now I'm actually sitting here watching it. Help me?!! 🐢
@queen_ursula_uk that's true but I feel like it was only on last month 😝
@queen_ursula_uk but it wasn't on that long ago; you can't have forgotten already?!!
@andyWclift Happy 1st Anniversary Andy 😀
@andyWclift have you watched it? I found the voice over a bit weird. Was that trying to make it like the comic? I've never read them.
I realized I've been reading all the tweets about what an asshat Trump is w/ gritted teeth and now given myself a headache. Thanks Donald! 😡
Imagine being nominated for an Oscar and then Trump comes along! Arghhhhhhhhh!!!!!!!!! 😡 https://t.co/ql2YW8jvQO
I finally got round to watching the last 2 seasons of #OITNB in a massive binge and now I'm so sad I don't know what to do with myself 😞😭
@queen_ursula_uk I have such boring train journeys compared to you! Go you! 💕
God I hope signing this doesn't get me banned from the States!! https://t.co/1IEvHoviZy
@EstevanGrand just having a bad life at the moment 😞
I am so depressed & I've eaten over 4000 calories today 😞
It's a crisp salad kinda night. Cheese, bacon, onion, salt & vinegar; perfectly balanced! 😝 https://t.co/ehIZiVogY4
Joseph Fiennes as Michael Jackson is like a bad Spitting Image scene! How could Stockard Channing not laugh looking at that?!! #pleasebefake
I think this is all just a crazy dream cos I ate too much cheese 🧀 https://t.co/doZjPmRWSi
@OriginalFunko Me & Carl just hanging out...he's a bit of a grump https://t.co/VtsPlu9dQW
@g0ldendaaaays @OriginalFunko You look naked. Do you have to be naked to hold it?! 😝
@princess_ludlow We should so do this! 💕 https://t.co/9Ogh9BNVFo
So far today I've painted 1& 1/2 walls in my bedroom. This is equivalent to most regular people running a marathon #lackingmotivation
@queen_ursula_uk maybe Woostie is squirreling them away behind the bath? He might be having dinner parties with the other cats?! 🍴
@queen_ursula_uk just don't throw away the cutlery cos then we'll have to go shopping again 😝 💕
Why isn't McFarland, USA available to rent on @lovefilm ??
@queen_ursula_uk not anymore 😞
@queen_ursula_uk oh my god; that would annoy the shit out of me!!!
@queen_ursula_uk oh my gosh; what beautiful dresses!! 💕
I've ordered The Best Awful book twice in the last 2 days & both orders have been cancelled. Don't say you have them for sale if you don't!!
@queen_ursula_uk he is really cute!! Or is he a she? I don't know cos I've not seen the film yet 😝
@queen_ursula_uk ...else I'll never stop....you know I have impulse control issues 😝
@queen_ursula_uk just one that I have an acorn charm on that I got when I finished Brenchley. I don't want to start collecting charms...
@queen_ursula_uk that is ADORABLE!! 😘
@leighlew3 wasn't yours darkangel something? Or angel4ever or something? 😝
I just cried watching Ellen get the Presidential medal of Freedom #Ellen #lgbt #love
@queen_ursula_uk did you eat the walnut though? 😝
@queen_ursula_uk put the lid back on & save it. Xx
@queen_ursula_uk @eventbrite how exciting!! 💕
@queen_ursula_uk ...they don't last forever though so if you hated them they would fade 😝
@queen_ursula_uk yep I've seen horrific ones but Liz & her friend got them done together & they're both good. I think I would be scared! ...
@queen_ursula_uk Liz got hers done at a place in Meopham or maybe NAG; they're really good. I can get the details if you want X
I'm playing WordBrain and I've just reached brain size 456! #WordBrain #words
@EstevanGrand it IS fine to be a minority; no matter what racist & bigoted people may think or say. Much love to you 😀
@EstevanGrand I hope in the other universe I'm richer and thinner! 😝
@EstevanGrand apply for asylum over here?! 😝
I've read more whole Twitter feed shaking my head in public re: Donald Trump. I look like a crazy person 😝
@queen_ursula_uk @DisneylandParis yours was a gazillion times better! That one looks a bit like Donald Trump!
This is worth a watch. What a knob https://t.co/YFld023pNs
@queen_ursula_uk I saw this the other day on Amazon. He's so cute!!! 💕

@queen_ursula_uk you finally got a screwdriver! Hazzah!!
Watching Bridget Jones 2 when you're depressed isn't the best idea 😞
@leighlew3 yup, that looks awesome! Adding it to my to watch list right now! 😂

I'm sorry I keep retweeting to win Funko Pops but if you saw how many I have in my front room you'd realize how in love with them I am! 💕
@JDMorgan @JensenAckles @jarpad the sign in the background is great 'don't be a tosser, roll your bowls' that has a different meaning in UK

I've just realized (after watching 700 utube vids) I've got hooded eyelids which is why I can't ever do eyeliner properly. I need new eyes 😳

@taperoo2k I liked it. There's a lot of good new shows. Nothing's like the days of Buffy tho! Have you watched Vice Principals?
@taperoo2k I've finished it too

@RebaJaneMoore yay! The police are here!!
I wish my drunk neighbors would SHUT THE FUCK UP! I want to kill them!!! Angry angry angry Becky!!

@leighlew3 what??
